data.comment: The big names in today's match at De Kuip have now been confirmed.
The match is underway at De Kuip.
In the minute 26, Jens Toornstra (Feyenoord) has received a first yellow card.
Goal! Ridgeciano Haps gives Feyenoord a 1-0 lead in Rotterdam.
That's a fine assist from Steven Berghuis.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second-half is underway at De Kuip.
Sparta have been given a penalty at De Kuip...
In the minute 52, Lennart Thy scores from the spot to level the match at 1-1.
Uros Spajic for Feyenoord has been booked by Kevin Blom and receives a first yellow card.
Adil Auassar is booked for the away team.
In the minute 68, Dick Advocaat is making the team's first substitution at De Kuip with Lutsharel Geertruida replacing Leroy Fer.
Steven Berghuis (Feyenoord) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Henk Fraser (Sparta) is making a first substitution, with Emanuel Emegha replacing Mario Engels.
In the minute 75, Nicolai Jorgensen is on a sub for Bryan Linssen for Feyenoord.
George Johnston is replacing Mark Diemers for the home team.
Sven Mijnans is replacing Lennart Thy for Sparta at De Kuip.
